testsuite.name: com.ae.qa.testcasesWorkflowAdmin.CategoriesPageTestWA
testsuite.system-out: User LogIn Succesfully Categories tab clicked Category name is entered which is only mandatory field Actual Category created message is :Workflow category created successfully Expected Category created message is :Workflow category created successfully Category created succesfully User signed out successfully

User LogIn Succesfully Categories tab clicked Edit Button corresponding to required category is clicked Category Description is entered Actual Category edited message is :Workflow category updated successfully Expected Category edited message is :Workflow category updated successfully Category edited succesfully User signed out successfully

User LogIn Succesfully Categories tab clicked Workflow which needs to move is checked category in which wf needs to move is selected from dropdown Actual message is :Workflow(s) category changed successfully Expected message is :Workflow(s) category changed successfully Workflow assigned to category succesfully User signed out successfully

User LogIn Succesfully Categories tab clicked Category from which wf needs to remove is selected Workflow assigned to category is removed Actual message is :Workflow removed from this category successfully Expected message is :Workflow removed from this category successfully Workflow removed from category succesfully User signed out successfully
